guitars.name: Stratocaster
guitars.short_description: Classic electric guitar with versatile tones.
guitars.long_description: The Fender Stratocaster is a legendary electric guitar known for its iconic design and versatile sound. It features a comfortable neck, three single-coil pickups, and a tremolo system.

guitars.name: Les Paul
guitars.short_description: Iconic electric guitar with a rich, warm tone.
guitars.long_description: The Gibson Les Paul is a legendary electric guitar known for its solid body construction and powerful, warm tone. It features dual humbucking pickups, a mahogany body, and a set neck.

guitars.name: Streamliner
guitars.short_description: Vintage-inspired electric guitar with a retro vibe.
guitars.long_description: The Gretsch Streamliner is a vintage-inspired electric guitar that combines classic aesthetics with modern playability. It features Broad'Tron pickups, a Bigsby tremolo, and a lightweight body design.

guitars.name: 814ce
guitars.short_description: High-quality acoustic guitar with a balanced sound.
guitars.long_description: The Taylor 814ce is a premium acoustic guitar that offers exceptional tone and playability. It features a solid spruce top, rosewood back and sides, and Taylor's renowned Expression System 2 electronics.

pedals.name: DS-1
pedals.short_description: Classic distortion pedal with a wide range of tones.
pedals.long_description: The Boss DS-1 is a legendary distortion pedal that has been a staple on countless pedalboards. It offers a wide range of distortion tones, from mild crunch to full-on saturation.
features: Powered by 9V battery or AC adapter

pedals.name: Big Muff Pi
pedals.short_description: Iconic fuzz pedal with a thick, creamy tone.
pedals.long_description: The Electro-Harmonix Big Muff Pi is a legendary fuzz pedal known for its thick, creamy tone. It delivers a rich, sustaining fuzz that can range from smooth and warm to wild and aggressive.
features: Powered by 9V battery or AC adapter
